XenotypeDef.label: headlox
XenotypeDef.description: Racism is no new feat to residents of the Rim. This far out on the Rim, a number of melanated Baseliners allied to protect themselves which gave birth to a new set of Baseliners from which other Xenotypes then sstemmed from and added to.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: The roots of Basenegro isolation are long forgotten, but regardless they tend to live apart from other pawns.

XenotypeDef.label: hemoloc
XenotypeDef.description: Following the explosion of interest in the Sanguophage, a Melan Inc. outpost worked hard to replicate the combination in their own genestock, leading to the creation of the Dhampir. despite wanting to come out with the first inheritable version, all such experiments failed and instead lead to this xenotype. their mix of melanin and the traditional vulnerability to UV rays lead to a much less impactful version, of such, as well as a less voracious hemogen appetite. \n\nThis initial failure in their original goal was then repackaged and marketed to match the current depiction of the Dhampir as a more stealth-based Xeno with offensive abilities if they needed to protect themselves, but ultimately able to pass as a normal pawn should it be necessary following their weaknesses.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Dhampir are known for their stealth and ability to blend in on rim worlds, especially on worlds with little to do with other Sanguophages.
